subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Squeaking into the playoffs on a 1-4-1 downer and a sub-.500 record, The Red Bulls perservered to advance to M.L.S. Cup final next Sunday against the Columbus Crew.
snippet: Squeaking into the playoffs on a 1-4-1 downer and a sub-.500 record, The Red Bulls perservered to advance to M.L.S. Cup final next Sunday against the Columbus Crew.
